content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Identify ONE historical development that contributed to the growth of a global economy during the period circa 1800–1914.Explain ONE way governments responded to economic crises or depressions during the period circa 1900–1945.Explain ONE way states changed their economies in response to the shifting global balance of power during the period circa 1945–1990.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Identify ONE historical development that contributed to the growth of a global economy during the period circa 1800–1914.Explain ONE way governments responded to economic crises or depressions during the period circa 1900–1945.Explain ONE way states changed their economies in response to the shifting global balance of power during the period circa 1945–1990.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
